[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OS-macOS-blue.svg?longCache=True)]()

#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install mac-headphones
```

#### Scripts usage
command|`usage`
-|-
`headphones` |`usage: headphones`

#### Examples
plugged:
```bash
$ headphones
1
```

not plugged:
```bash
$ headphones
0
```
